name: Wakevenom Thorn
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A silent, poisonous thorn flies from you into a target creature within range that you can see. They must make a Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed. While paralyzed, they hallucinate that they are acting normally.

If the creature takes damage, they can make a Knowledge saving throw with advantage to realize they are hallucinating. On a success, they make a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of their turns or when they take damage. On a success, the spell ends.
empower: Targets up to three creatures, each of whom cannot be more than 10 feet from another target.
